sentences.en: A drier climate would be good for her health.
sentences.cn: 气候较干燥的地区会对她的健康有益.

sentences.en: After the accident, the drier was hurt but coherent.
sentences.cn: 事故发生后, 司机受了伤,但头脑比较清醒.

sentences.en: And it is much cooler and drier.
Dear friends, thank you for choosing the Company's Refrigeration Compressed Air Drier.
sentences.cn: 朋友, 感谢你选用了本公司生产的冷冻式压缩空气干燥机.

sentences.en: Drier conditions lead longer droughts, hydropower electricity production decreases.

sentences.en: I dry my hair with an electric hair drier after washing hair.

sentences.en: I'll have to change the plug on the hair drier.
sentences.cn: 我得更换吹风机的插头了.

sentences.en: If the climate gets drier, then the logical conclusion is that even more drought will occur.
sentences.cn: 如果气候变得更干燥，必然会出现更多旱情。

sentences.en: If you buy a drier, look for one with a sensor which switches off when clothes are dry.
sentences.cn: 你若要买烘干机，找一台带感应器的，可以在衣服干的时候自动断电。

sentences.en: In drier areas, police are trying to contain widespread looting.
sentences.cn: 在淹水较少的地方, 警方正试图制止普遍的哄抢行为.

sentences.en: Main products include hair drier , digital hair pin, small appliance.
sentences.cn: 主要产品有电吹风, 电发夹, 小家电等.

sentences.en: She untangled her hair from the hair - drier.
sentences.cn: 她把搅在吹风机上的头发松开了.

sentences.en: The soil is firming up now that the weather is drier.
sentences.cn: 天气干燥了,土壤也变得坚硬起来.

sentences.en: The weather grew drier and the grass became scanty and the nomads stirred afresh.
sentences.cn: 气候干燥,水草稀少,游牧民重新动荡起来.
